name: Trap
desc: Nice and kinky clothing wearing out for the nightclub.
text:
!User opens the box and finds some clothing to wear for a nightclub.
They decide it to wear it and go out to have some fun.

name: Maid Uniform
desc: Standard uniform for the nightclub maids. Softly presenting their bodies to visitors as they clean up the messes from the floor and tables. Additionally performing other duties if paid by a client.
text:
!User opens the box and finds some maid uniform to wear for a nightclub with a note on it.
The note reads "Come to our yiff bar all dressed up if you want to work here.

name: Reindeer Uniform
desc: Festive uniform for the nightclub 'toys'. Collared & ready to be leashed by any paying clients.
text:
!User opens the box and finds some reindeer uniform to wear for a nightclub, with fake antlers, gloves that act as mitts, collar and a harness with bells. They also find a note.
The note reads "Come to our yiff bar all dressed up if you want to work here.

name: VIP Pass
desc: A VIP pass for the local yiff nightclub.
text: !User opens the box and finds an plastic card. Carefully looking they observer its a VIP pass for the local yiff bar. A pass to one of the stripes.

name: Nightclub Uniform
desc: Standard nightclub clothing to get yiffed by the DJ.
text:
!User opens the box and finds a set of fishnets, striped armwear, legwear and a jockstrap.
A note is attached to the jockstrap that reads "Come to the yiff bar to have some fun.

name: Dildo
desc: A dildo for sexual penetration and stretching that back end for something else.
text: !User opens the box and finds a small dildo and a note attached to it. The note says "Come to the nightclub with it and show us just how a good 'girl' you are by playing with it."

name: Costume
desc: An costume desgined to enforce the wearer to be helpless and controled by the leash holder.
text: !User opens the box and finds a costume with belts, straps, locks, gag and a collar. The letter simple says "Come to the yiff club. Better be dressed when you arrive."
